subject: about Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor
description_text:
helllo
i want to ask few things
is possible to order the Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motors with eu cabble?

and i will ask if there is possible to order spare parts for pedals?
somehow the edge of plastic washer on clutch pedal is broken. i did fix it
but i want to replace it

 [image: 0.jpg]

greetings
Andrej

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 8333 中
